name: Bonk! (Shadowstorm Games)
description:
What is it?

Bonk! is actually a remake of Pong! developed by a member and co-founder of Shadowstorm Games.

Differences between Pong! and Bonk! are:

  • Players control Cheems instead of rectangles
  • Ball is Picardía instead of a square
  • It actually has a background
  • FPS counter included
